titleStmt.title: A true list of the aldermen and common-council-men of the several wards of the honourable city of London, for this present year 1683.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for W.C. and are to be sold by W. Davis in Amen-Corner near Pater-noster-Row,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
